column5: Hey Everyone,  I was wondering if anyone could provide some insight on where I could consider for fishing this Sunday. I'm in Markham, just outside of Toronto.  I'd consider the Haliburtons but I don't know the area.  Fishing tribs is another option, but I've never tried it during the winter.  I don't need to know anyone's "honey hole", just a general area.  If you don't want to post it here, please PM me.  Thanks, Stan
You can try splake like me in any stocked MNR splake lake, lots to choose from if your interested pm and I will give you some suggestions
